The Biden administration: s transition team designated seven women to fill top-ranking communications jobs, which is a first in presidential history.
Under the Trump administration: men served in three equivalent senior communications positions.
Social media posts and news stories anno: elect Joe Biden and Vice President-elect Kamala Harris.
Multiple news outlets: including The Washington Post and The Associated Press, reported that it would be the first time in history that the entire senior White House communications team would be entirely female.
